item.description:
What is Blue Man Group?

Comedy. Music. Multimedia Theatrics.

Combine all three, add a spot of blue, and you've got the makings of a totally unique form of entertainment.

More than 17 million people around the world have experienced the playful party atmosphere of a Blue Man Group live event. Our theatrical shows are creating buzz in New York, Boston, Chicago, Las Vegas, Orlando, Berlin, Tokyo, and on tour throughout the U.S. and Canada

We will be joining another meetup group to go to see Blue Man Group in Boston!!!! If you have never seen them then this is something you have to do!!

I know this is short notice but I have have to pay this week in order to get the group discount rate. The regular price is $82 and the group rate is $50.($52 by paypal)

If you want to pay by check I will send you my address, if you want to pay by paypal I will tell you how to do that.

Check out the link       

 

               http://www.blueman.com/about
item.how_to_find_us: We will carpool and meet in the lobby

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: Blue Man Group in Boston!!!
